ValidationRule.description: Second payment date must be at least five days later than First Payment Date. Second payment date cannot be 30 days greater than First Payment Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( genesis__Payment_Frequency__c , 'SEMI-MONTHLY-PD') , IF( AND(OR( IF( genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c) < 0 , 6 , genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c)) < 6,
IF( genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c) < 0 , 10 , genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c)) > 30
),
OR(
genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c) >= -6,
genesis__Second_Due_Day__c - DAY(genesis__Expected_First_Payment_Date__c) < -25)) , true , false ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Second payment date must be at least five days later than First Payment Date. Second payment date cannot be 30 days greater than First Payment Date.
